entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 08 January 2023
